# Maintainers

Get maintainer based checks.

[Function of the `cchecks` R package](https://docs.ropensci.org/cchecks/reference/cch_maintainers.html).

## Maintainers

Get all maintainers.

Default limit of 10.

```{r results="asis"}
args <- c("https://cranchecks.info/maintainers/")
get_and_show(args)
```

```{r}
cchecks::cch_maintainers()
```

## Maintainers by email

Get maintainer summary by email.

```{r results="asis"}
args <- c("https://cranchecks.info/maintainers/csardi.gabor_at_gmail.com")
get_and_show(args)
```

```{r}
cchecks::cch_maintainers(x = "csardi.gabor_at_gmail.com")
```
